short_description: aaa sling is an industrial machinery & supplies company based in grand rapids, michigan, united states.
long_description: aaa sling inc. is a rigging supplier in michigan best known for our quality products, superior service, and our professional staff. we provide the industry's best known brands, top sellers, and most cost effective products whose quality has been proven over decades of dependable performance. with an unmatchable; combination of products and expertise; we are uniquely positioned to be your greatest resource for material handling, load securement, iron worker tools and fall protection suppliers. aaa sling & industrial supply inc. is a full service rigging, and cargo control shop. we started in 1986 and have progressed to become one of michigan's largest shops. we specialize in wire rope, chain, nylon webbing, and slings, as well as distribution of crosby hardware, hoists, fall protection, tie-down equipment, and other equipment used in rigging, lifting or cargo control. our goal is to provide our customers and potential customers the best products combined with quality service. our services are available for inspections for wire ripe, chain, chain mesh, nylon and polyester slings.
